dmca.title: Notice of Claimed infringement
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: James R. Duby, Jr. [mailto:Jim@Dubylaw.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, March 06, 2007 12:08 PM
To: Copyright
Cc: abuse; webmaster@dickflash-nospam.com
Subject: Notice of Claimed infringement

 

 

 

 

DUBY & ASSOCIATES, PLC

 

ATTORNEYS

 

3511 COOLIDGE ROAD

 

SUITE 200

 

EAST LANSING, MICHIGAN 48823

 

(517) 371-9835

 

FAX (517) 371-9840

 

E-MAIL Jim@Dubylaw.com <mailto:Jim@Dubylaw.com> 

 

March 6, 2007

 

 

 Andrea Z. Almeida

 The Planet.com Internet Services, Inc.

 1333 Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110

 Dallas, Texas 75207

 

 

Re: NOTIFICATION OF INFRINGEMENT OF TECHSMITH CORPORATION

 CAMTASIA and CAMTASIA STUDIO SOFTWARE PROGRAMS

 

            Dear Ms. Almeida

 

1.        Please be advised that TechSmith Corporation ("TechSmith") is
the owner of the copyrights in and to its CAMTASIA and CAMTASIA STUDIO
software programs and the owner of:  (a) the U.S. federally registered
and EU registered mark CAMTASIA, U.S. Reg. No. 2,488,689 and EU Reg. No.
2068575; (b) the U.S. federally registered mark and Benelux registered
mark CAMTASIA STUDIO, U.S. Reg. No. 2,488,689 and Benelux Reg. No.
789534; and (c) its most famous mark TECHSMITH, U.S. Reg. Nos.
1,749,869, 2,320,170, 2,706,748 and EU Reg. No. 2068609.  As a result,
TechSmith established its prior use and exclusive nationwide and
worldwide right to use its famous marks.  

 

2.        We have good faith belief that the site www.dickflash.com
<http://www.dickflash.com/>  and more specifically at 
http://www.dickflas.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=19788
<http://www.dickflas.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=19788>  is currently
displaying/posting an unauthorized key code of
CM55G-BMCK2-HTZ4E-9FJL7-LR53A and TechSmith's famous marks related to
its CAMTASIA STUDIO computer software program to facilitate the
unauthorized downloading of the program without the permission of
TechSmith Corporation, a scanned image of which is attached.  

 

3.        TechSmith has publicly distributed its CAMTASIA and CAMTASIA
STUDIO copyrightable software programs under its   registered famous
marks CAMTASIA and  CAMTASIA STUDIO since at least November 5, 1999 and
worldwide thereafter.  For a full description of TechSmith's CAMTASIA
and CAMTASIA STUDIO software program and related products go to 
www.techsmith.com <http://www.techsmith.com/> .  

 

4.        The infringing CAMSTUDIO STUDIO program can be viewed and
downloaded without TechSmith's permission and in a manner outside of
TechSmith's License  for the program at www.dickflash.com
<http://www.dickflash.com/>  and more specifically at 
http://www.dickflas.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=19788
<http://www.dickflas.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=19788>  along with an
unauthorized key code of CM55G-BMCK2-HTZ4E-9FJL7-LR53A for the same, a
scanned image of which is attached.  

 

5.        Please contact us on behalf of the Complaining Party TechSmith
at:  

 

DUBY & ASSOCIATES, PLC

James R. Duby, Jr.

3511 Coolidge Road, Suite 200

East Lansing, MI  48823

517-371-9835 - DD Phone

517-371-9840 - Fax

Jim@Dubylaw.com <mailto:Jim@Dubylaw.com> 

Intellectual Property Counsel for TechSmith Corporation

 

6.        Please use this Notice of Copyright and Trademark Infringement
to take all steps necessary to remove and/or block access to the
infringing CAMTASIA STUDIO program, key code and links located on the 
www.dickflash.com <http://www.dickflash.com/>  and more specifically at 
http://www.dickflash.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=19788
<http://www.dickflash.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=19788>  which is
currently displaying/posting an unauthorized key code of
CM55G-BMCK2-HTZ4E-9FJL7-LR53A of  TechSmith's CAMTASIA STUDIO computer
software program to facilitate the downloading of the program, without
the permission of TechSmith, a scanned image of which is attached.   

 

The statements contained herein are accurate and we are authorized to
act on behalf of the copyright and trademark owner TechSmith
Corporation, said statements being made under penalty of perjury.  

 

 

Very truly yours,

DUBY & ASSOCIATES, PLC

/James R. Duby, Jr. /

James R. Duby, Jr.

CONFIDENTIAL AND PRIVILEGED: The information contained in this message
(including any attachments) may be attorney client privileged and
confidential information solely for use by the intended recipient. This
message is for contact purposes only and does not constitute an
electronic signature or an intent to contract unless expressly stated.
If the reader of this message is not the intended recipient, the reader
is notified that any use, dissemination, distribution or copying of the
communication is strictly prohibited. If you have received this
communication in error, please immediately notify DUBY & ASSOCIATES, PLC
by telephone at 517-371-9835.

FEDERAL TAX NOTICE: In accordance with the Department of Treasury
Circular 230, please be advised that any statements contained herein
(including any attachments hereto) are not intended to be used, and may
not be used by you or any other person, for the purpose of avoiding
penalties that may be imposed under federal tax law.
dmca.principal_name: Duby and Associates, PLC (for TechSmith Corporation)
